title: Challenge 3: LCD1602
description: Write the code to display a message on the LCD1602:
codeSolution:
import machine
import utime
from machine import I2C

# Initialize I2C communication
i2c = I2C(scl=machine.Pin(5), sda=machine.Pin(4))  # Replace '5' and '4' with the appropriate GPIO pin numbers

# Initialize the LCD1602
lcd = machine.I2C_LCD1602(i2c)

while True:
    lcd.puts('Hello, LCD!')
    utime.sleep(2)
